result.eng: I'd like a pint of beer please.
result.ga: ba mhaith liom pionta beorach le do thoil
result.orig: ba mhaith liom pionta beorach le do thoil
result.html: ba mhaith liom pionta beorach le do thoilI'd like a pint of beer please.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ liom pionta beoraċ le do ṫoilI'd like a pint of beer please.

result.eng: They sell beer at an exaggerated price. They sell overpriced beer.
result.html: díolann siad beoir ar róphraghasThey sell beer at an exaggerated price. They sell overpriced beer.
result.ponchtml: díolann siad beoir ar róṗraġasThey sell beer at an exaggerated price. They sell overpriced beer.

result.eng: Czech beer is the best in the world.
result.ga: beoir na seice an bheoir is fearr ar domhan
result.orig: beoir na seice an bheoir is fearr ar domhan
result.html: beoir na seice an bheoir is fearr ar domhanCzech beer is the best in the world.
result.ponchtml: beoir na seice an ḃeoir is fearr ar doṁanCzech beer is the best in the world.

result.eng: He isn't interested in anything except beer and women.
result.ga: níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná
result.orig: níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mná
result.html: níl suim aige in aon rud seachas beoir agus mnáHe isn't interested in anything except beer and women.
result.ponchtml: níl suim aige in aon rud seaċas beoir agus mnáHe isn't interested in anything except beer and women.

result.eng: That's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ga: sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.orig: sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoir
result.html: sin rud nach bhfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.
result.ponchtml: sin rud naċ ḃfeictear go minic cailín a ólann beoirThat's something you don't see often, a girl who drinks beer.

result.eng: I will drink a bottle of beer, please.
result.ga: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoil
result.orig: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoil
result.html: Ólfaidh mé buidéal beorach le do thoilI will drink a bottle of beer, please.
result.ponchtml: Ólfaiḋ mé buidéal beoraċ le do ṫoilI will drink a bottle of beer, please.

result.eng: Don't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ga: ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.orig: ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do lá
result.html: ná blais aon deor den bheoir mhallaithe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
result.ponchtml: ná blais aon deor den ḃeoir ṁallaiṫe le do láDon't taste a single drop of that damned beer as long as you live.
